ComicInfo.Title: Divine Punishment
ComicInfo.ScanInformation: Divine Punishment Â©2021 Codex Entertainment LLC
ComicInfo.Summary: Lili: The Demoness ch.5 - Divine Punishment - We begin this adventure where the previous issue left off. Lili and Grace has just finished dinner and decide to go for a stroll. While walking the streets of Grimsmont City Lili is attacked but an ancient demon and his hell hounds. During this encounter she is confronted by a new enemy. Ace & Starlet, two fast talking agents of the Center for Abnormal & Unearthly Phenomenon (C.A.U.P). Later, Detective Mallory witnesses firsthand the lengths the C.A.U.P will go to keep a lid on its operations.
